Class LibrarySchedulerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.client.LibrarySchedulerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISchedulerClient

    public class LibrarySchedulerClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISchedulerClient
    This class manages topology by invoking IScheduler's interface directly as a library.
